dcterms:description: The MTG-Jamendo dataset is a collection of music tracks used for automatic music tagging. It includes features such as Mel-spectrograms and is divided into subsets for different tasks, including mood and theme recognition.
dcterms:title: MTG-Jamendo Dataset
